name: King Quest
description:
A 2D platformer game with 10 levels and 9+ types of enemies.

Main character of this game is Human King. Right Now he has only one type of attack. In the game you have dodge or beat the enemy its your choice.

Assets

All Assets in this game is from a Pixel Frog. Also I am modified the assets when i need it.

https://pixelfrog-assets.itch.io/
